extDescription.message: Remove boring parts of YouTube videos like sponsorship inserts.

options_segmentsBar_color_intro.description: The title of the color selector for the video intro segment.

options_segmentsBar_color_logo.description: The title of the color selector for the channel logo segment.

options_segmentsBar_color_merch.description: The title of the color selector for the merch segment.

options_segmentsBar_color_social.description: The title of the color selector for the social plug segment like 'we are on Facebook/Twitter/Reddit'.

options_segmentsBar_color_sponsor.description: The title of the color selector for the sponsor segment.

options_segmentsBar_enabled.message: Display video segments on the video progress bar.
options_segmentsBar_enabled.description: The title of the checkbox for enabling the segments bar.

options_feedback.message: Offer to vote on skipped segments.
options_feedback.description: The checkbox label for option to offer to vote on video segments.

options_feedback_time.message: Number of seconds to display the feedback UI for.
options_feedback_time.description: The input field label for a checkbox to offer to vote on video segments, in seconds.

options_serverAddress.description: The input field label for server address.

options_userKeys_title.description: The checkbox label for option to automatically report all errors to the server.

options_userID_title.description: The section header for for use unique identifier and keys.

options_userID.description: The display field label for user unique identifier.

options_userKeys_export.description: The button that displays the user private key so that it can be backed up.

options_userKeys_import.description: The button that allows for import of a private key.

options_userKeys_new.description: The button that generates a new user identifier.

options_userKeys_explanation.message: Generate new key pair for signing information sent to server. Warning: Your private key will be deleted. All previous section reports will no longer be attributed to you. Consider backing up the current private key.
options_userKeys_explanation.description: The button that generates a new key pair.

options_userName_placeholder.description: The placeholder text for input field.

options_save.description: Button that saves the data in the form.

submissionManager_delete_segment.description: Label of the button that appears next to each segment and deletes that segment.

submissionManager_no_segments.message: There are no known segments yet.
submissionManager_no_segments.description: Message that appears in the submission manager when there are no known segments.

submissionManager_submit.description: Label of the button that appears in the submission manager.
